analysis.description:
Reentrancy in MocoCrowdsale._processPurchase (/unique_chucks/23/0x4ded37aefa9ad8ff498a70d7798e8e3e11f985d1.sol):
	External calls:
	- super._deliverTokens(beneficiary,tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/23/0x4ded37aefa9ad8ff498a70d7798e8e3e11f985d1.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _balances (/unique_chucks/23/0x4ded37aefa9ad8ff498a70d7798e8e3e11f985d1.sol)

TimedCrowdsale.constructor (/unique_chucks/23/0x4ded37aefa9ad8ff498a70d7798e8e3e11f985d1.sol#611-619) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(openingTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/23/0x4ded37aefa9ad8ff498a70d7798e8e3e11f985d1.sol#614-615)

TimedCrowdsale.isOpen (/unique_chucks/23/0x4ded37aefa9ad8ff498a70d7798e8e3e11f985d1.sol#629-640) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp >= _openingTime && block.timestamp <= _closingTime (/unique_chucks/23/0x4ded37aefa9ad8ff498a70d7798e8e3e11f985d1.sol#633-639)

TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (/unique_chucks/23/0x4ded37aefa9ad8ff498a70d7798e8e3e11f985d1.sol#648-655) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > _closingTime (/unique_chucks/23/0x4ded37aefa9ad8ff498a70d7798e8e3e11f985d1.sol#653-655)

MocoCrowdsale.lockedHasEnd (/unique_chucks/23/0x4ded37aefa9ad8ff498a70d7798e8e3e11f985d1.sol#958-962) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > _unlock1 (/unique_chucks/23/0x4ded37aefa9ad8ff498a70d7798e8e3e11f985d1.sol#960-962)

MocoCrowdsale.lockedTwoHasEnd (/unique_chucks/23/0x4ded37aefa9ad8ff498a70d7798e8e3e11f985d1.sol#965-969) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > _unlock2 (/unique_chucks/23/0x4ded37aefa9ad8ff498a70d7798e8e3e11f985d1.sol#968-969)

MocoCrowdsale.getBonusAmount (/unique_chucks/23/0x4ded37aefa9ad8ff498a70d7798e8e3e11f985d1.sol) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp < bonusPeriod (/unique_chucks/23/0x4ded37aefa9ad8ff498a70d7798e8e3e11f985d1.sol)

MocoCrowdsale._lockedZone should be constant (/unique_chucks/23/0x4ded37aefa9ad8ff498a70d7798e8e3e11f985d1.sol#830-831)
